title: The ChatGPT maker is the latest AI giant to reveal it’s working with the defense industry, following similar announcements by Meta and Anthropic.
content: OpenAI, maker of ChatGPT, has entered a partnership with Anduril, a defense startup that makes missiles, drones, and software for the U.S. military. OpenAI’s AI models will be used to improve systems used for air defense, said Brian Schimpf, cofounder and CEO of AndurIL. It marks the latest in a series of similar announcements made recently by major tech companies in Silicon Valley.
author: Will Knight
